name: Dodgimals - Beta
description:
Hi there!

This is the Beta for our game Dodgimals.

We're a Team of 6 Students at the Mediadesign Hochschule in Munich, Germany.

If you like what you see why don't you buy us a beer or two? ;)

Install Instructions

Only Windows 7/8/8.1/10 for the moment! Sorry

Just Download the .zip file and extract the .exe file.

If you have any problems just contact us: info@specktacular.wtf

Controls

You can control the Dodgimals using keyboard or gamepads with xinput.

  • LS or A/D -> Movement
  • A Button or Space -> Jump
  • RT or K (Hold to charge) -> Throwing Ball
  • D-Pad or Arrow Keys -> Navigate through Menus
  • A Button or Space -> Confirm selection in Menu

You like to give us Feedback?

Just send us a mail: info@specktacular.wtf
